channel.title: Gaming on credibleDEV
channel.description: Recent content in Gaming on credibleDEV

item.title: Linux CPU Schedulers and Why They Are Important
item.description: In this post we break down what CPU Schedulers are in Linux and why they are important. We also delve into CPU Scheduler options for Linux and which one may be best for Gaming on Linux.

item.title: Running Battle.net Games on Linux using Bottles
item.description: This guide will walk you through setting up Bottles on Linux to run Battle.net games.
